pullrequest.title: Added cmd_vel_twist control topic to TrackedVehiclePlugin

content.raw: I believe the [test/integration/tracked_vehicles.cc](https://bitbucket.org/peci1/gazebo/src/4ff4748b97e1710a888bdfdb5032ab19b2b9aa0d/test/integration/tracked_vehicles.cc#lines-63:64) test is still using the `Pose` message ([and also here](https://bitbucket.org/peci1/gazebo/src/4ff4748b97e1710a888bdfdb5032ab19b2b9aa0d/test/integration/tracked_vehicles.cc#lines-197:198)). Perhaps you can update it to use the twist message instead?
content.html: I believe the test/integration/tracked_vehicles.cc test is still using the Pose message (and also here). Perhaps you can update it to use the twist message instead?
